Text.val: 12.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
27.11.2010 GB SCR16024 Fixed problem with save the CMDI_CURRENCY
08.03.2010 GB SCR15364 Extended selection for "Save ageing outstanding disputes"
02.12.2009 GB SCR15106 Added the part Save ageing outstanding disput

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO, INVO_MARKCODESPEC, INVA_CURRENCY, cast(sum(INVA_ACTASPECIAL) as decimal (13,2)), cast(count(*) as decimal (9)) from :1/INVO, :1/INVA, :1/ADMN, :1/CLNT where INVO_NO = INVA_NO and ADMN_NO = INVO_ADMNO and CLNT101_ADMNO = INVO_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = INVO_CLNTNO and INVO_AACTUALI<>0 and INVO_MARKCODESPEC > 0 and (INVA_CURRENCY = CLNT108_ACC_CURR or INVA_CURRENCY = ADMN_CURRENCY) group by INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO, INVO_MARKCODESPEC, INVA_CURRENCY order by INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO, INVO_MARKCODESPEC, INVA_CURRENCY for fetch only

select cast (sum (INVO_AACTUALH * (days(':4') - days(INVO_MARKCODESPECDATE))) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum (INVO_AACTUALC * (days(':4') - days(INVO_MARKCODESPECDATE))) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/INVO, :1/MARK where INVO_MARKCODESPEC = MARK_CODE and INVO_ADMNO = :2 and INVO_CLNTNO = :3 and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and not(INVO_MARKCODESPECDATE is null) and MARK_CODEDISPUTE = 'Y' for fetch only

select INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO, INVO_DISPUTEREASON, (select CLNT108_ACC_CURR from :1/CLNT where CLNT101_ADMNO = INVO_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = INVO_CLNTNO) from :1/INVO, :1/MARK where INVO_MARKCODESPEC = MARK_CODE and MARK_CODEDISPUTE = 'Y' and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 group by INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO, INVO_DISPUTEREASON for fetch only

select count(*), cast (sum (INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/INVO, :1/MARK where INVO_MARKCODESPEC = MARK_CODE and INVO_ADMNO = :2 and INVO_CLNTNO = :3 and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and INVO_DISPUTEREASON = :4 and MARK_CODEDISPUTE = 'Y' for fetch only
